sub_title: Managing Partner Risk Advisory & Lead Partner Sustainability
summary:
Harvey Christophers is both the Managing Partner for our Risk Advisory practice and also our Sustainability leader for Deloitte Netherlands.  He is also the senior partner responsible for our global relationship with Ahold Delhaize having focused for many years serving clients in the retail sector.

With Deloitte for three decades, Harvey has undertaken various roles across the United Kingdom, South Africa, Australia and now the Netherlands. Prior to taking on his current role Harvey was the Managing Partner for Deloitte Risk Advisory in Australia and Managing partner of our Cape Town office. 

Throughout his career, Harvey has gained extensive experience in a range of consultancy and operational areas, including: Governance Consulting (board and audit committee effectiveness assessment); Risk Management Consulting (gap and maturity analysis) and Risk Management Process Consulting; Internal Audit Industry Consulting ( internal audit transformation and assurance mapping);  Internal Audit Outsourcing & Co-sourcing and Quality Assurance Reviews; Control Framework Design and Implementation; and, Business Process Improvement. 

Harvey holds an honours degree from UK’s University of Nottingham.

Specialities: With extensive experience in the management consulting sector, Harvey’s key areas of specialisation include:

•	Risk Management & Process
•	Internal Audit & Audit Transformation
•	Internal Controls Transformation
•	Sustainability Reporting
•	Business Transformation

profile_positions.description: As Managing Partner of Risk Services at Deloitte Australia, I led a team of 600 risk professionals in Australia to help clients realise “the worth of risk" in building risk intelligence to manage and lead their businesses. In this position, I was responsible for the overall goals and growth plans in the Risk Advisory area, including strategic planning; performance assessment; ensuring objectives are met; financial planning and monitoring; recruitment; risk management; and, stakeholder / client relations.

profile_positions.description: Prior to becoming Managing Partner of Risk Services at Deloitte AU, I was Lead Partner of Risk Services in Sydney. In this role, I was involved in some of the following risk service delivery areas: contract risk compliance; control transformation; crisis management; financial crime; forensic; internal audit; project risk; risk transformation; security; work, health and safety. In this position, I led consulting activities and was involved in the development of strategy and implementation.
